description: Dark-haired, muscular Marco and slender, toned Hayes take a dip in the pool, and have a quick chat before heading off to release some pent up tension. “His dick looks good to eat,” says Marco, referring to brown-haired Hayes. “Three things about Marco; his ass because it jiggles, his arms and he’s got nice back muscles too!” says Hayes about the hunky bottom. “I love to look at his colorful eyes when he’s fucking me,” says Marco. “I love a wet, sloppy blow job, and I hope I get to cum in his face because I really like that,” adds Hayes.
title: Hayes & Marco: Bareback
